name: UIActivityItemsConfigurationReading
desc: A set of methods adopted by an object so that the object can act as an activity items configuration.

items.name: var itemProvidersForActivityItemsConfiguration: [NSItemProvider]
items.desc: The item providers for the configuration.

items.name: var applicationActivitiesForActivityItemsConfiguration: [UIActivity]?
items.desc: The application activities, if any, for the configuration.

items.name: func activityItemsConfigurationMetadata(key: UIActivityItemsConfigurationMetadataKey) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the configuration for the specified metadata key.

items.name: func activityItemsConfigurationMetadataForItem(at: Int, key: UIActivityItemsConfigurationMetadataKey) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the configuration for a particular item for the specified metadata key.

items.name: struct UIActivityItemsConfigurationMetadataKey
items.desc: A structure that defines keys for the metadata associated with an activity items configuration.

items.name: func activityItemsConfigurationSupports(interaction: UIActivityItemsConfigurationInteraction) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the activity items configuration supports the specified type of interaction.

items.name: struct UIActivityItemsConfigurationInteraction
items.desc: A structure that describes types of interactions.

items.name: func activityItemsConfigurationPreviewForItem(at: Int, intent: UIActivityItemsConfigurationPreviewIntent, suggestedSize: CGSize) -> NSItemProvider?
items.desc: Returns an activity items configuration preview for the specified item and preview size.

items.name: struct UIActivityItemsConfigurationPreviewIntent
items.desc: A structure that specifies the types of activity item previews.
